edu.asu.itunesu
Class ITunesUConnection

Object
  ITunesUConnection

public class ITunesUConnection
extends Object

The iTunesU Web Services API connection.

Author:
Dave Benjamin

Constructor Detail

ITunesUConnection

public ITunesUConnection(String siteUrl,
                         String debugSuffix,
                         String sharedSecret,
                         String[] credentials)
Constructor.

Parameters:
siteUrl - The URL to your site in iTunes U. The last component of that URL, after the last slash, is a domain name that uniquely identifies your site within iTunes U.
debugSuffix - A suffix you can append to your site URL to obtain debugging information about the transmission of credentials and identity information from your institution's authentication and authorization services to iTunes U.
sharedSecret - A secret key known only to you and Apple that allows you to control who has access to your site and what access they have to it.
credentials - The credential strings to assign to users who should have the permission to administer your iTunes U site.
Method Detail

setIdentity

public void setIdentity(String displayName,
                        String emailAddress,
                        String username,
                        String userIdentifier)
                 throws ITunesUException
Sets the identity from user information. Calling this method is optional. All parameters may be null.

Parameters:
displayName - The user's name.
emailAddress - The user's email address.
username - The user's username.
userIdentifier - A unique identifier for the user.
Throws:
ITunesUException

setIdentity

public void setIdentity(String identity)
Sets the identity from a string.

Parameters:
identity - The identity as a string.

getDebug

public boolean getDebug()
Gets the value of the debug flag which determines whether or not to use the debug prefix in requests. This flag is false by default.

Returns:
True if the debug prefix is enabled.

setDebug

public void setDebug(boolean debug)
Sets the value of the debug flag which determines whether or not to use the debug prefix in requests.

Parameters:
debug - True to enable the debug prefix, false otherwise.

getSite

public Site getSite()
             throws ITunesUException
Retrieves the entire site.

Returns:
A Site model object.
Throws:
ITunesUException

getSiteMinimal

public Site getSiteMinimal()
                    throws ITunesUException
Retrieves the entire site, loading a minimal amount of data. Permissions and tracks are omitted. Only the name and handle attributes are populated.

Returns:
A Site model object.
Throws:
ITunesUException

mergeSite

public void mergeSite(String siteHandle,
                      Site site)
               throws ITunesUException
Updates site information. Same as calling mergeSite() with mergeByHandle and destructive set to false.

Parameters:
siteHandle - Handle for the site to update.
site - Object containing site information.
Throws:
ITunesUException

mergeSite

public void mergeSite(String siteHandle,
                      Site site,
                      boolean mergeByHandle)
               throws ITunesUException
Updates site information. Same as calling mergeSite() with destructive set to false.

Parameters:
siteHandle - Handle for the site to update.
site - Object containing site information.
mergeByHandle - If true, merge sections by handle. Otherwise, merge by name.
Throws:
ITunesUException

mergeSite

public void mergeSite(String siteHandle,
                      Site site,
                      boolean mergeByHandle,
                      boolean destructive)
               throws ITunesUException
Updates site information.

Parameters:
siteHandle - Handle for the site to update.
site - Object containing site information.
mergeByHandle - If true, merge sections by handle. Otherwise, merge by name.
destructive - If true, delete any unspecified sections or permissions.
Throws:
ITunesUException

showTree

public String showTree(String handle)
                throws ITunesUException
Reads XML for an element by its handle.

Parameters:
handle - Handle of the parent element, or null for the whole site.
Returns:
An XML string.
Throws:
ITunesUException

showTree

public String showTree(String handle,
                       String keyGroup)
                throws ITunesUException
Reads XML for an element by its handle, specifying a key group.

Parameters:
handle - Handle of the parent element, or null for the whole site.
keyGroup - Must be one of: minimal, most, maximal
Returns:
An XML string.
Throws:
ITunesUException

showFeed

public String showFeed(String handle)
                throws ITunesUException
Reads RSS feed XML for an element by its handle.

Parameters:
handle - Handle of the element.
Returns:
An XML string.
Throws:
ITunesUException

getUploadUrl

public String getUploadUrl(String handle,
                           boolean forXml)
                    throws ITunesUException
Generates and returns a new iTunesU upload URL.

Parameters:
handle - Handle for the destination.
forXml - True for uploading XML, false for uploading content.
Returns:
The URL as a string.
Throws:
ITunesUException
